4.content:
Hello Kate!

Welcome to Trapezoid Health!
I am Daniel, the managing director of the company.
4.name: Dialogue

17.content: Congratulations on your new job as a Supply Chain Director.
17.name: Dialogue

293.content: Now let me show you your office.
293.name: Dialogue

23137.content: Your task is to allocate {drugName} inventory to meet our demand, and to keep sufficient inventory by ordering {drugName} from our supplier.
23137.name: Dialogue

23139.content: Just keep in mind that our customers might change the way they order from us based on how we deliver their products.
23139.name: Dialogue

24121.content: You can review your goal by clicking on this button.
24121.name: Dialogue

24153.name: Action

24294.content: You can check the sales revenue as well as inventory and backlog cost by clicking on this button.
24294.name: Dialogue

24315.action_text: For each unit of {drugName}: price is $5 inventory cost is $1 backlog cost is $10
24315.name: Action

24328.name: Action

26264.content: Your main goal is to maximize the company's sales revenue and to minimize overal cost.
26264.name: Dialogue

26265.content: The company's overall cost consists of the inventory cost and the cost of stockout in case we're out of {drugName}.
26265.name: Dialogue

28119.content: Click or tap anywhere on the screen to move the game forward.
28119.name: Dialogue

28120.content: This game is a research experiment and part of a study on pharmaceutical supply chains led by a research group at Northeastern University.
28120.name: Dialogue

28122.content: During this game, you will be deciding how to allocate {drugName} inventory to health-centers, and how to order it from your supplier.
28122.name: Dialogue

28149.content: In case you're not familiar with Saline solution, here is what it looks like. It is a mixture of sodium chloride in water which has a number of uses in medicine.
28149.name: Dialogue

28866.content: Do your best in increasing our market share by deciding how to allocate current {drugName} inventory to health-centers, and how to order from our supplier.
28866.name: Dialogue

28871.content: After finishing the game, you will be asked to complete a short survey.
28871.name: Dialogue

28872.content: We will be recording your responses to the questions and decisions in the game and questions in the survey.
28872.name: Dialogue

28873.content: You need to be 18 years or older to participate in this research.
28873.name: Dialogue

28874.content: The entire process will take around 45 minutes. You may stop playing at any time by exiting the web page or closing your web browser.
28874.name: Dialogue

28875.content: We will store your data only if you agree to share your data at the end of the experiment. Data will be collected anonymously.
28875.name: Dialogue

furniture.name: Text
